questions.question: What is the primary function of the analog IR sensor in your project?

answers.b: To measure the distance to an object

questions.question: What type of pin on the Arduino Uno is the analog IR sensor connected to?
What is the relationship between the analog IR sensor's voltage output and the distance to an object?

answers.a: They are inversely proportional and non-linear.
answers.b: They are directly proportional and linear

questions.question: What is the main role of the NPN transistor in your circuit?

answers.c: To act as a switch, amplifying the low current from the Arduino to control the relay or LED

questions.question: In your project, why is a relay used?

answers.a: To control the speed of the motor
answers.b: To safely control the high-power 12V DC motor with the Arduino's low-power signal
answers.c: To control the brightness of the LED
answers.d: To provide power to the sensor
